bibl.title: Marriage on the Rocks: Pamphile in Menander's Epitrepontes. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Lecture presented at "The Archimedes Palimpsest Colloquium" held at the Eötvös Collegium, Budapest, 18-22 September 2007. - [Introduction.] - Arnott's text [ed.: W. Geoffrey ARNOTT, Menander's Epitrepontes in the Light of the New Papyri, Law, Rhetoric, and Comedy in Classical Athens. Essays in Honour of Douglas M. MacDowell (Swansea, 2004) pp. 269-292]. - Restored text of 785-835. - Translation.
AUSTIN Colin, Marriage on the Rocks: Pamphile in Menander's Epitrepontes. Avec résumé en anglais.
